author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Drake Reveals "More Life" Release Date
text:
Drake has officially given us a concrete answer for when his More Life playlist will be released. In an Instagram video with highlights from the Boy Meets World Tour, Drizzy says the project will drop March 18. üå∫ A post shared by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Mar 11, 2017 at 10:51am PST 
We won‚Äôt got into all the detail now about why we can‚Äôt trust this date because we already did that. 
But last night, the Toronto star shared that he was finishing More Life after the show when he was getting to the hotel. 
The project is expected to feature some of the artists he connected with while traveling in Europe. The lead singles were ‚ÄúSneakin'‚Äù with 21 Savage, ‚ÄúFake Love‚Äù and ‚ÄúTwo Birds One Stone.‚Äù Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get
